actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize medical and dental care and related benefits for reservists and members of the National Guard who contract a disease or become ill while on duty for thirty days or less, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Entitles to specified medical and dental benefits members of the uniformed services or the National Guard who become ill in line of duty while on active duty for a period of 30 days or less, or who become ill while on full-time training duty or inactive-duty training when such illness is incurred or aggravated as an incident of such training.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize medical and dental care and related benefits for reservists and members of the National Guard who contract a disease or become ill while on duty for thirty days or less, and for other purposes.
